content: Not sure, but bors has been behaving funny today (see the "bors is forgetful about test failures" thread).
Based on looking at the homu source code, it looks like that error is because bors errored when telling GitHub that the merge succeeded? Something about the fake_merge() function it seems.
422 Update is not a fast forward seems to be an error from GitHub.
thanks. soudns like I should just try those PRs again

@Manish Goregaokar There was a major outage today: https://www.githubstatus.com/incidents/bdbzpz7qxmbx

The 422 error has been around for a long time, see https://github.com/rust-lang/homu/issues/75. My understanding is that it is somehow related to delays in caching, and presumably the outage was causing lots of delays and other issues.
